title: Exercise Management
noExercises: No exercises yet. Create your first exercise!
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this exercise?
createFillInBlankTitle: Create Fill in the Blank Exercise
previewInfo: Preview mode: Results will not be saved and no XP will be awarded.
question: Question
minOptionsRequired: Question {{number}}: At least 2 options are required
correctAnswerRequired: Question {{number}}: You must select the correct answer
correctAnswerInvalid: Question {{number}}: The selected correct answer does not exist
fillInBlankInfo: How to create a Fill in the Blank exercise:
fillInBlankStep1: Use exactly 3 underscores (___) to mark each blank
fillInBlankStep2: The number of blanks must match the number of answers
fillInBlankStep3: You can add multiple accepted answers (separated by commas)
fillInBlankStep4: Optional: Add hints and explanations to help students
mcqInfo: How to create an MCQ exercise:
mcqStep3: Select the correct answer with the radio button
mcqStep4: Optional: Add an explanation that will be displayed after answering
blankCountMismatch: Question {{number}}: The number of blanks ({{blankCount}}) does not match the number of answers ({{answerCount}})
blankAnswerRequired: Question {{number}}, Blank {{blank}}: At least one correct answer is required
editFillInBlankTitle: Edit Fill in the Blank Exercise
dragDropInfo: How to create a Matching exercise:
dragDropStep1: Write a clear instruction (e.g., 'Match the words with their translations')
dragDropStep2: Add pairs of items to match (e.g., French word - Russian translation)
dragDropStep3: Right items will be automatically shuffled for the user
dragDropStep4: Optional: Add an explanation that will be displayed after answering
leftItemRequired: Question {{number}}, Pair {{pair}}: Left item is required
rightItemRequired: Question {{number}}, Pair {{pair}}: Right item is required
minPairsRequired: Question {{number}}: At least 2 pairs are required
dragInstruction: Drag the right items to their matching left pair
listenAndFillBlanks: Listen and fill in the blanks
listenToAudioBeforeAnswering: Listen to the audio before answering
buildCorrectSentence: Put the words in the correct order
clickWordsToAddThem: Click on words to add them
perfectScore: üéâ Perfect! You have mastered this exercise!
greatJob: üëè Very good! One more push for perfection.
perfectScoreForXP: To earn the XP for this exercise, you need to get a 100% score. Try again to aim for perfection!
listenToAudio: Listen to the material's audio to complete this exercise
